summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of East Union Street from Thirty-fifth Avenue to Thirty-seventh Avenue in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks & grading under Ordinance No. 13716, creating Local Improvement District No. 1252 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
